img.alt: Washington Park Community School - Newburgh Heights Ohio
Washington Park Community School We Are The Patriots

div.h3:
Washington Park Community School
WE ARE THE PATRIOTS
div.div: Washington Park Community School is located in Newburgh Heights, Ohio. We proudly serve grades Kindergarten through 8th grade where academic growth and achievement is our top priority! We believe very strongly that all students have the ability to learn, grow, improve, and succeed. WPCS is committed to deliver instruction to young scholars by developing their strengths. We are the Patriots! We work hard to achieve!

div.p: Â Â Â The mission of Washington Park Community School is to produce scholars who are good citizens in school, in the community and the neighborhood in which they live and the world that they share.Â Washington Park Community School will be a virtue-centered and child-centered school committed to academic excellence, emphasizing attention to being and becoming just, wise, courageous, persevering, responsible, generous and caring citizens.Â Emphasis will also be placed on the importance of public participation through civic action and community service.Â These are the values and goals that this community school will instill in the young minds of tomorrowâ€™s leaders.

a.span: Breakfast & Lunch Available for Pickup- Monday, March 30th

div.h3: Our campuses are living laboratories for sustainability.

div.span: We support all learners from Kindergarten to 8th grade. Take a visit and see what being a Patriot Pride student is all about.Â
